channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China accuses Philippines of 'playing with fire' on Taiwan
Simulated Chinese blockade of Taiwan reveals Singapore as lifeline
Video emerges of Sha'Carri Richardson shoving boyfriend at Seattle airport prior to arrest
NBA Fans React As Luka Doncic Spends $2 Million On Rare Car With Only 150 Units In The World
Woman arrested for allegedly stealing over $1,000 worth of merchandise in Orange County
Israeli security cabinet approves Netanyahu's plan to occupy Gaza City
item.description: The Israeli security cabinet has approved plans by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to occupy Gaza City.

item.title: Trump orders colleges to prove they don’t consider race in admissions
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday signed a memorandum requiring colleges to prove they do not consider race in admissions.
